channel.title: Kissimmee Planning Advisory Board - Public Notices
channel.description: Public notices for Kissimmee Planning Advisory Board meetings and proceedings

item.title: Bid Notices and Requests for Services - Orlando
item.description:
OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1
Meeting: Friday, February 13, 2026 at 12:00 PM
--- Full Notice Text --- OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1. RFP-26-15434-TP Property and Casualty Insurance Broker Services. There will be No Pre-Proposal Conference for this project. Deadline for Questions: Friday, February 13, 2026 at 12:00 PM, local time. Proposal Due Date: Tuesday, February 24, 2026 at 2:00 PM, local time. Contact: Ted Phillips at 407-742-0929. 2. AR-26-15733-NO On-Site Aerial and Pump Testing for Fire Apparatuses. There will be No Pre-Bid Conference for this project. Deadline for Questions: Thursday, February 5, 2026, at 2:00 PM, local time. Due Date: Tuesday, March 3, 2026 at 2:00 PM, local time. Contact: Nancy Ortiz at 407-742-0940. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. 1/25/2026 7922902

item.title: Miscellaneous Notices - Kissimmee
item.description:
LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) RFLOI-26-15573-TP Plan and Design a Performing Arts Center (PAC), P...
--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) RFLOI-26-15573-TP Plan and Design a Performing Arts Center (PAC), Parking and related Public Infrastructure at NeoCity. There will be no pre-bid Conference for this project. 287.055, F.S. solicitation: Step 1- Letter of Interest (Initial Certification); Step 2- Request for Proposals; Step 3 Competitive Negotiation. Step 1- Letter of Interest (Initial Certification) -- Deadline for questions: Friday, January 30, 2026, at 12:00 P.M. Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, February 10, 2026, at 2:00 P.M. Local Time. Contact: Ted Phillips at (407)742-0929; Step 2- Request for Proposals and Step 3 - Competitive Negotiation dates for questions and responses to be released via addendum after submissions are received for Step 1 -Letter of Interest (Initial Certification). FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. January 22, 2026

item.title: Miscellaneous Notices - Kissimmee
item.description:
LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) PS-26-15567-LA - Architectural and Engineering Services For The Osce...
--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) PS-26-15567-LA - Architectural and Engineering Services For The Osceola County Solid Waste Transfer Station. The solicitation document and any addenda can be accessed and downloaded from VendorLink at the following web address: Vendorlink.osceola.org. There will be a VIRTUAL NON-MANDATORY PRE-PROPOSAL CONFERENCE held on Monday, January 12, 2026, at 1:00 PM Local Time. Dial in at 407-906-2344, and when prompted, enter the following conference code: 852 500 276#. Please note the meeting will be audio recorded. The deadline for questions is Friday, January 16, 2026, at 4:00 PM Local Time. DUE DATE: Tuesday, February 3, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Luis Aviles (407) 742-0937. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. January 1, 2026
